name: Action
description: Movies with high-energy physical stunts, chases, and combat sequences

name: Comedy
description: Light-hearted movies designed to amuse and provoke laughter

name: Drama
description: Character-driven plots with realistic themes and emotional content

name: Science Fiction
description: Speculative fiction dealing with futuristic concepts and technology

name: Horror
description: Films that seek to elicit fear or disgust in the audience

name: Romance
description: Focus on romantic relationships and emotional desires

name: Thriller
description: Suspenseful, exciting plots that keep viewers on the edge of their seats

name: Animation
description: Films created through the manipulation of images or illustrations

name: Documentary
description: Non-fictional films intended to document reality for education or record

name: Fantasy
description: Films with magical or supernatural elements not explained by science
